title: Understanding Generational Financial Advice: A Conversation on Retirement and Inflation
subtitle: Explore the generational gap in financial advice as young adults confront issues like inflation and student loan debt, challenging outdated values.
content:
Son, I'd like to give you my number one piece of financial retirement advice. Don't care. That's the problem with your generation.

No, Dad. That's the problem with your generation. We care about inflation. Do you have any idea what it's like to live off of a $40,000 salary that has the purchasing power of a nickel?

Care about student loan repayment restarting? How much did you pay for college back in the 50s? That's what I thought.

97% of us want to pursue our goals right now. When we're all old and 100% of us are tired of hearing from people like you with old values for old generations.

Well, okay then. We like corn, Dad. We just like corn. It's the most beautiful thing.
